title: Can't type in numbers or code into prepaid card redemption??
body: Hey guys. I just bought a $25 gift card for that new Ahri chroma and I wanted to redeem my code. I went to the redemption page and no numbers were coming up on the client. I tried the other redemption page on the purchase RP section and it still won't work. I don't think it is me because I can type numbers perfectly fine everywhere else but.

replies.body: It's strange that your input isn't being read, but I'd like to help.  Do you regularly use Internet Explorer, and if so do you have any kind of security settings that might be blocking you from adding information for payment submissions? To confirm, what kind of gift card do you have?  Depending on the time, you may need to redeem it elsewhere.  Let me know!
I submitted a bug report on this and used this thread as the link at the end of the report. Hope this gets us all some help. I suggest you all do the same if you haven't yet.
Oh man thank god im not the only one
I'm having the same issue, I don't no how to fix it D:
I also restarted the client. No fix. :( I just want me {{champion:103}}
